events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected, and I want to request a refund for it as soon as possible.
The system has classified this case under the Refund category due to the customer's request for a money back.
Your request has been assigned to one of our support agents who will assist you with the refund process shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason why you want a refund so I can process the request faster?
My order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on your website and I am very disappointed.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately after receiving the product back from you. We will send you a prepaid shipping label.
That sounds good, I appreciate your quick response and the prepaid label will make returning the item easier for me.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Please share your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
